entry.title: 部分Coinbase 用户在社区反映，他们在试图将比特币从币安转移到 Coinbase时遭到了外国资产管制办公室(OFAC)的通知，提示其比特币来自受制裁地址，交易无法进行。...
entry.summary: 部分Coinbase 用户在社区反映，他们在试图将比特币从币安转移到 Coinbase时遭到了外国资产管制办公室(OFAC)的通知，提示其比特币来自受制裁地址，交易无法进行。Coinbase 发言人表示，这是一个技术问题，约 100 名用户受到影响，目前问题已得到解决。（CoinDesk） https://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/03/08/coinbase-ofac-bug-affected-fewer-than-100-people-and-has-been-fixed/

entry.summary: Re 据华尔街日报报道，Alameda Research 已起诉加密资产管理公司 Grayscale Investments，指控其多收管理费并不正当地阻止投资者赎回其比特币和以太坊信托。诉讼称，如果 Grayscale 削减费用并允许赎回，Alameda 持有的基金价值将至少达到 5.5 亿美元，比目前的价值高出约 90%。https://www.wsj.com/livecoverage/stock-market-news-today-03-06-2023/card/ftx-s-alameda-research-sues-grayscale-over-fees-redemptions-U7Bj9tdI075BLcWKe809

entry.title: This terminology of bitcoin vs “alts” is woefully outdated. It’s overly crude and doesn’t account for younger projects with real business models a...
entry.summary:
This terminology of bitcoin vs “alts” is woefully outdated. It’s overly crude and doesn’t account for younger projects with real business models and real fundamentals.
Kun: The idea of BTC down 10% so Alts have to go down 30% was the Meta when projects had no fundamental basis You can see many crypto projects now up even when btc drops as revenues, yield etc create psychological floors that didnt exist last run Watch out for relative strength
